Do it online

Apply for a Permit

Building permits, maps, planning, zoning, ProjectDox, remodeling and more.

Make a Payment

Pay utility bill, parking and municipal court citations, and business license renewal fee.

Solve a Problem

Report a pothole, code violations, and more.

Parks and Recreation

Find parks, reserve a facility, register for programs.

Apply for a Job

View city job openings and apply online.

Watch City Meetings

Watch live and recorded City Council and Commission meetings.

File a Police Report

Submit an incident to MPD and print your own police report.

Who to Call at City Hall

Directory of who to call for City services.

Our Government

Submit a Public Records Request, learn about your City leaders, and more.

Meetings

Upcoming Meetings 

Planning Commission Study Session

April 28, 2025, 12:00 PM

This Commission typically holds study sessions the second and fourth Monday of the month.

Site Plan and Architectural Commission Meeting

May 02, 2025, 12:00 PM

This Commission typically meets the first and third Friday of the month.

Budget Committee Meeting

May 03, 2025, 09:00 AM

The Budget Committee typically holds meetings four to five times during odd years to review the preliminary budget for the biennium. Additional meetings are held as needed.

Community Services & Development Commission Meeting

May 06, 2025, 12:00 PM

This Commission typically meets the first Tuesday of the month.

Landmarks and Historic Preservation Commission Meeting

May 06, 2025, 05:30 PM

This Commission typically meets the first Tuesday of the month.

City Council Meeting

May 07, 2025, 06:00 PM

The City Council holds meetings the first and third Wednesday of the month.
View More Meetings

Public Notices

The Backyard Community Food court

Consideration of plans for a semi-permanent pod development—The Backyard Community Food Court—on two contiguous parcels totaling approximately 0.32 acres (gross: 0.45 acres) and zoned C-H (Heavy Commercial). The property is located at 807 & 812 Riverside Avenue.

Freight Logistics

Consideration of plans for the construction of three new office buildings, totaling approximately 6,100 square feet on three separate parcels totaling 0.93 acres. The subject parcels are located at 251, 280 and 281 Commercial Court, approximately 250 feet east of Riverside Avenue and Commercial Court intersection within the Heavy Commercial zoning district.

Airport Chey Oil, Lube, Detail Shop

Consideration of plans for the construction of a new commercial building to be used as a repair, carwash, and detail shop to be sited northwest of the existing Airport Chevrolet auto dealership building. The site is located at 3001 Biddle Road and consists of a single parcel totaling approximately 5.53 acres, developed with the Airport Chevrolet auto dealership.
View More Public Notices

Latest News

Volunteers Remove Nearly 1.4K Pounds of Trash, Debris from City Parks

Published on April 28, 2025

Twenty-seven volunteers dedicated over 140 hours in March to cleaning up City parks and Eastwood Cemetery, removing nearly 1,400 pounds of trash and natural debris.

Medford Fire Celebrates Excellence at 2025 Annual Awards Banquet

Published on April 24, 2025

The Medford Fire Department honored its team of exceptional first responders during its 2025 Annual Awards Banquet—an evening that recognized outstanding service, leadership, and dedication across the organization.

City of Medford Announces New Leadership

Published on April 22, 2025

The City of Medford is pleased to announce three recently filled leadership positions: Assistant City Manager, Economic Development Director, and Planning Director.
View More News
